title: Looking to ID this lovely typeface
content:
Hi,

I was something someone would be able to identify the typeface used for the title "A frustrated youth" on this poster.

Thank you !

Font: 

 Metro #2 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055145/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [A frustrated youth](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055145/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_md65foKtDz1rz4e6qo1_1280.png) | 885.97 KB |
author: manifold

comments.content: A [Metro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055145/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Metro) should work (#2, Grosse Pointe Metro, Geometric 415...).
Thanks Ryuk! As always, you rock!
Always a pleasure, Thomas! And for the same price, 2 more options to consider: DH Sans and Examiner
